title: I changed my summoner's icon ingame, but wont change here?
body: I bought a summoner's icon for 250 RP, but it only changed ingame, not on the boards. halp.

replies.body: Your account needs to sync with the boards, and that can take a bit sometimes.  Unfortunately, it's not possible for me to offer any eta because I simply don't know when that could be!  Hopefully it will be in no time!
